data.title: Locations & District Map
data.meta_description: The Avondale School District proudly provides K-12 education to the Auburn Hills, Rochester Hills, Troy and Bloomfield Township areas. View our district map.
data.text:
Avondale School District Locations and District Map

Avondale School District is comprised of four traditional elementary schools, a Gifted & Talented school, a middle school, a traditional high school, and an alternative high school that is a blend of in-person and online learning. We serve the Rochester Hills, Auburn Hills, Troy, and Bloomfield Township areas, and we are a School of Choice school district that openly welcomes families and students who live outside the school district. Whether youâ€™re a parent coming to check out one of our schools to decide to send your child here, or a community member coming to a school to volunteer for an event - all locations, addresses, and contact info are below for your use. Each location has a designated letter/number code that corresponds with its location on the District Map at the bottom of the page.

Download Avondale School District Map
